Entry.name: AOG
Entry.value: Declined - Loss or Damage Due to Act of God - See Correspondence

Entry.name: CAC
Entry.value: Amend - Correction to Amount Claimed - Keying or Transmission Error

Entry.name: CCD
Entry.value: Declined - Carrier Disagrees with Consignee Damages Noted - Documentation to Follow

Entry.name: CDC
Entry.value: Amend - Compromise Offered on Concealed Damage

Entry.name: CDI
Entry.value: Declined - Carriers Not Given an opportunity to Inspect Claimed Damages

Entry.name: CFO
Entry.value: Declined - Claim for Other than Loss, Damage or Delay to Shipment - See Correspondence

Entry.name: CFT
Entry.value: Declined - Claim Not Filed within Time Limits of Contract of Carriage

Entry.name: CIB
Entry.value: Amend - Claim on Incorrect Basis - Sales Loss vs Market Decline, or Retail vs Invoice

Entry.name: CIC
Entry.value: Amend - Correction to Initial Claim Filed for Preliminary Estimate

Entry.name: CNG
Entry.value: Amend - Destination Inspection Reveals Contributory Negligence - Compromise Settlement Offered

Entry.name: CNL
Entry.value: Amend - Destination Inspection Reveals Not Carrier Liability - Salvage Proceeds Offered in Settlement

Entry.name: CSD
Entry.value: Declined - Claim Supporting Documentation Required by Carrier

Entry.name: CSO
Entry.value: Amend - Compromise Settlement Offered for Other Reasons - See Correspondence

Entry.name: CSR
Entry.value: Amend - Clear Seal Record on Shortage Portion of Claim

Entry.name: CTA
Entry.value: Amend - Coal Tolerance Allowance Deducted

Entry.name: DAM
Entry.value: Amend - Damaged Merchandise Not Refused to Carrier Salvage Allowance Deducted

Entry.name: DDO
Entry.value: Declined - Delay due to Owner in Releasing or Reconsigning Shipment - See Correspondence

Entry.name: DMN
Entry.value: Amend - Part of Claim For Manufacturing Defect or Omission Not Noted During Inspection

Entry.name: DNH
Entry.value: Declined - Did Not Handle Claimed Shipment - See Correspondence

Entry.name: DNI
Entry.value: Declined - Did Not Handle Claimed Shipment - No Correspondence to Follow

Entry.name: DNR
Entry.value: Amend - Concealed Damage or Shortage Not Reported to Carrier

Entry.name: DNS
Entry.value: Declined - Claimed Damages Not Segregated for Inspection

Entry.name: DOA
Entry.value: Declined - Shipment Involved in a Derailment or Another Carrier's Line

Entry.name: DPS
Entry.value: Declined - No Market Decline on Delayed Perishable Shipments

Entry.name: DSA
Entry.value: Amend - Invoice Discounts or Special Allowances Not Deducted

Entry.name: DUP
Entry.value: Declined - Duplicate Claim - See Correspondence

Entry.name: FIS
Entry.value: Declined - Claim for Delay Filed on Incorrect Schedule - See Correspondence

Entry.name: GSA
Entry.value: Amend - Grain Shrinkage Allowance Deducted

Entry.name: GWL
Entry.value: Amend - Settlement on Gross Weight Loss or Other Scale Differences

Entry.name: IAW
Entry.value: Amend - Improper Average Weights Used in Determining Loss

Entry.name: ICC
Entry.value: Amend - Incorrect Calculation of Claim - See Correspondence

Entry.name: INC
Entry.value: Declined - Claim Filed with Intermediate Carrier

Entry.name: INF
Entry.value: Declined - Request for Delayed Inspection Not Properly Filed

Entry.name: MAN
Entry.value: Amend - Origin Inspection Reveals Part of Claim Due to Manufacturing Defects or Omissions

Entry.name: MDD
Entry.value: Declined - Claimed Damage is Manufacturing Defect, Not Transportation Damage - See Report

Entry.name: NCA
Entry.value: Declined - Non-Compliance with Memorandum of Agreement - See Correspondence

Entry.name: NCR
Entry.value: Amend - Destination Inspection Reveals Part of Claim Not Carrier Responsibility

Entry.name: NDI
Entry.value: Declined - Claimed Damage or Shortage Noted During Origin Inspection - See Report

Entry.name: NFT
Entry.value: Amend - Claim Not Filed within Time Limits of Contract of Carriage - Salvage Proceeds Offered in Settlement

Entry.name: NLI
Entry.value: Declined - No Liability Indicated - See Correspondence

Entry.name: NNI
Entry.value: Declined - Claimed Damage or Shortage not Noted During Destination Inspection - See Report

Entry.name: NRC
Entry.value: Declined - Claimed Damage or Shortage not Reported to Carrier

Entry.name: OCC
Entry.value: Declined - No Answer to Outstanding Correspondence from Claimant

Entry.name: OTH
Entry.value: Declined - Declined for Other Reasons - See Correspondence

Entry.name: RAC
Entry.value: Declined - Refiled - Amended Claim - No Documentation to Follow

Entry.name: RAD
Entry.value: Declined - Amended Claim - Documentation to Follow

Entry.name: RUC
Entry.value: Declined - Refiled - Unamended Claim -No Documentation to Follow

Entry.name: RUD
Entry.value: Declined - Refiled - Unamended Claim - Documentation to Follow

Entry.name: SMA
Entry.value: Declined - Salvageable Material Not Available to Carrier

Entry.name: SNA
Entry.value: Declined - Compromise Settlement Not Accepted

Entry.name: SRD
Entry.value: Declined - Shipper Responsible for Damage - See Correspondence

Entry.name: SRE
Entry.value: Amend - Origin Inspection Reveals Shipper Responsibility - Salvage Proceeds Offered in Settlement

Entry.name: VDC
Entry.value: Declined - Vehicle Damage Claimed Does Not Qualify for Deferred Inspection

Entry.name: VDD
Entry.value: Declined - Vehicle Delivered Subject to Inspection - Not Notified of Damage

Entry.name: VDI
Entry.value: Declined - Vehicle Delivered Subject to Inspection - Not Notified within Required Time Period

Entry.name: VDQ
Entry.value: Declined - Vehicle Damage Claimed Does Not Qualify as Concealed Damage

Entry.name: VDS
Entry.value: Declined - Damage Severity of Vehicle Undercarriage Does Not Justify Part Replacement

Entry.name: VIS
Entry.value: Declined - Nature or Location of Vehicle Interior Damage Not Carrier Liability

Entry.name: VRP
Entry.value: Declined - Vehicle Repair Not Performed as Represented on Claim - Documentation to Follow
